alert.note: Alert for St. Marys (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 22 at 2:05PM EST until December 23 at 2:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 2 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low lying areas due to tidal flooding. * WHERE...Shoreline in St. Marys County. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 2 AM EST Friday, especially around the time of high tide. * IMPACTS...At 3.0 feet, yards are flooded on Saint George Island, and water will begin covering the road leading to the island, especially if there is wave action. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides two to two and a half feet above normal. The next high tide at Coltons Point is at 2:09 AM and 2:24 PM. The next high tide at Piney Point is at 1:33 AM and 1:48 PM. The next high tide at Point Lookout is at 12:09 AM and 1:09 PM. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. St Marys River at Straits Point MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 3.5 ft, Major 5.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.4 ft, Moderate 1.9 ft, Major 3.4 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 22/01 PM 2.8 1.2 1.3 2.0 None 23/12 AM 3.2 1.6 2.1 2.0 Minor 23/12 PM 2.7 1.1 1.4 3.0 None 24/01 AM 0.9 -0.7 -0.2 2.0 None 24/01 PM 1.0 -0.6 -0.3 2.0 None 25/02 AM 0.7 -0.9 -0.4 1.0 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
